params.payoutAmount: Amount to be paid out if triggered

returns.policyId: The ID of the created policy

params.coveragePeriodStart: Start timestamp of coverage period (optional, 0 for default)

returns.policyId: The ID of the created policy

returns._0: bool True if trigger condition is met
activePolicyIds Array of active policy IDs

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._basePremiumRate: New base premium rate in basis points

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.policyIds: Array of policy IDs to check and update

createPolicyFromTemplate(uint8,string,ui.notice: Create a new insurance policy from a template

evaluatePolicies(string,uint8,int256,uin.notice: Evaluate policies based on oracle weather data

evaluateTrigger(uint8,int256,int256).notice: Evaluate if trigger condition is met

getUserActivePolicies(address).notice: Get active policies for a user

getUserClaims(address).notice: Get claim history for a user

getUserPolicies(address).notice: Get all policies for a user

pause().notice: Pause the contract (prevents new policy creation)
